description: Phoenix was working out the other day when he noticed he had an admirer. As he was doing a few crunches, he noticed Kenny was standing in the doorway, watching him with lust in his eye. Phoenix decided to run with it, so he asked Kenny to come over and 'spot' him. When Kenny approached, he kneeled down right between Phoenix's legs and asked if this was a good position. From there, well, I'm sure you could guess what happens. Kenny blows Phoenix in the workout room. Not ONLY doesn't Kenny blow Phoenix there, he also sucks on Phoenix's Italian sausage in the entertainment room, where the two also strokes themselves to a creamy conclusion.Enjoy these two hunks!
title: Kenny & Phoenix
